title: Majority in Cabinet want to go to IMF ; Gammanpila
content: Minister of Energy Udaya Gammanpila stated that the majority view of the Cabinet is that the assistance of the International Monetary Fund is required to solve the Sri Lankaâ€™s financial crisis. Speaking to reporters on Friday (18), Gammanpila said he advocated to go to the IMF for a long period. He said the Finance Ministry and Central Bank must reach a final decision on the matter.
